title: Tom Brady Will Return ...
description:
Kevin, Nora, Danny, and Ben huddle to discuss the bombshell news that Tom Brady will return for another season. They speculate about what caused this decision, go over the implications, and break down how the league looks with another year of Brady.
Hosts: Kevin Clark, Danny Kelly, Ben Solak, Nora Princiotti
Senior Producer: Steve Ahlman
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
